0.Summary: "It is fun to work their the people are very kind but not all of them are and I want one with a higher paying job"
0.Pros: Very flexible schedule very understandable with situations
0.Cons: Doesn't pay much hours are not very consistent I want something I know will last and provide me enough money

1.Summary: "Fun and nice place to work at if you have a lot of patience"
1.Pros: Very easy to learn and can be used as a stepping stone to other better jobs to improve customer service and social skills. McDonald's is a good place for very young teens to get out there and talk to customers
1.Cons: Customers can sometimes be tough to deal with and some manager are either a hit or miss. You might have an awesome manager who knows what they are doing, and then some who have no clue and lazy.

2.Pros: Good hours good managers good pay

3.Pros: Lots of benefits available upon request.
3.Cons: Lots of work for little pay.

5.Pros: pay was okay, could be more

6.Pros: starting pay, and hours for starting employees
6.Cons: lots of work for the pay, and raises should be at least 0.25 each 6 months not 0.10 cents every 6 months.

7.Pros: free food, goof around with coworkers
7.Cons: Bad hours, rude management, rude customers

8.Pros: start from the bottom, the ability is given in order to climb to the top.
8.Cons: Pay is not very good, health insurance is expensive, no dental or vision even offered at all

9.Pros: Flexible scheduleRequested days off grantedHelped me pay bills while inI worked at 2 different McDonald's from November 2012 to May 2016. Working at McDonald's helped me get through college. It gave me a great work ethic and taught me when to take the lead.
9.Cons: Unprofessional managementUnmotivated employeesRude customersEven with the pros, these cons outweighed them. At my first McDonald's, every store owner we had (we had 3 in 3 years) only cared about themselves and didn't have true concern for employees. There was a lot of favoritism as well amongst upper management and shift managers when it came to employees.
